sentence.Network_cn: 她躺在楼梯底部，痛得呜咽着。

jx.jx_en_mean: To descend to the lowest point possible, after which only a rise may occur
jx.jx_cn_mean: 跌到谷底：跌到可能的最底点，在其后只有一个回升会发生

lj.lj_ly: Sales of personal computers have bottomed out.
lj.lj_ls: 个人电脑的销售跌到了最底点

jx.jx_en_mean: be the basic cause or origin of (something)

lj.lj_ly: he knew what was at the bottom of it—Jane wanted them to live together.
lj.lj_ls: 他知道真正的原因——简想和他生活在一起。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to refer to the sudden collapse or failure of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 出现暴跌（或垮台）的局面

lj.lj_ly: the bottom fell out of the market for classic cars.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express friendly feelings towards one's companions before drinking

phrase.cizu_name: from the bottom to one's heart

jx.jx_en_mean: starting at the lower end or beginning of a hierarchy or process and proceeding to the top
jx.jx_cn_mean: 从最底层做起；从头学起

lj.lj_ly: we began to study history from the bottom up.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 探明…的真相；弄清…的起因；寻到…的根子

jx.jx_en_mean: cause (something) to collapse or fail suddenly

lj.lj_ly: a shortfall in supplies would knock the bottom out of the engineering industry.
lj.lj_ls: 物资供应不足会使机械建造业崩溃。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal, chiefly N. Amer.)used to state one's conviction that a particular thing is going to happen
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式，主 北美)深信，确信

lj.lj_ly: you can bet your bottom dollar it'll end in tears.
lj.lj_ls: 可以确定，这要以眼泪收场。

means.word_mean: 底部;基部
其他释义
底部;底层;最低档

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  botm, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bodem 'bottom, ground' and German Boden 'ground, earth'

encyclopedia.content: 〃CSS Positioning Properties 定位属性中的一种属性‥ bottom版本：CSS2 兼容性：IE5+ 继承性：无 语法：bottom : auto | length 参数： auto : 无特殊定位，根据HTML定位规则载文档流中分配 length : 由浮点数字和单位标识符组成的长度值 | 百分数。必须定义position属性值为absolute或者relative此取值方可生效。请参阅长度单位 说明： 检索或设置对象与其最近一个定位的父对象底边相关的位置。 对应的脚本特性为bottom。其值为

entry.def: The bottom of something is the lowest or deepest part of it.

example.ex: He sat at the bottom of the stairs...
example.tran: 他坐在最下面的一级楼梯上。

example.ex: Answers can be found at the bottom of page 8.
example.tran: 在第8页末尾可以找到答案。

entry.tran: 最下方的；底部的；底层的
entry.def: The bottom thing or layer in a series of things or layers is the lowest one.

example.ex: There's an extra duvet in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
example.tran: 橱柜最底层的抽屉里还有一床羽绒被。

entry.def: The bottom of an object is the flat surface at its lowest point. You can also refer to the inside or outside of this surface as the bottom .

example.ex: Spread the onion slices on the bottom of the dish.
example.tran: 把洋葱片铺在盘底。

example.ex: ...the bottom of their shoes.
example.tran: 他们的鞋底

entry.tran: （某市场或产业的)最差状况，低谷
entry.def: If you say that the bottom has dropped or fallen out of a market or industry, you mean that people have stopped buying the products it sells.

example.ex: The bottom had fallen out of the city's  property market.
example.tran: 该市的房地产市场已陷入极度低迷。

entry.def: The bottom of a street or garden is the end farthest away from you or from your house.

example.ex: ...the Cathedral at the bottom of the street.
example.tran: 街道尽头的大教堂

entry.def: The bottom of a table is the end farthest away from where you are sitting. The bottom of a bed is the end where you usually rest your feet.

example.ex: Malone sat down on the bottom of the bed.
example.tran: 马隆在床脚坐下了。

entry.tran: （组织机构或职业架构的）最底层，基层
entry.def: The bottom of an organization or career structure is the lowest level in it, where new employees often start.

example.ex: He had worked in the theatre for many years, starting at the bottom.
example.tran: 他从最基础的干起，已经从事戏剧工作很多年了。

example.ex: ...a contract researcher at the bottom of the pay scale.
example.tran: 工资级别最低的合同研究人员

entry.tran: （调查、测试或联赛中的）表现最差者，最后一名
entry.def: If someone is bottom or at the bottom in a survey, test, or league their performance is worse than that of all the other people involved.

example.ex: He was always bottom of the class...
example.tran: 他一直是全班的最后一名。

example.ex: The team is close to bottom of the League.
example.tran: 这支球队快跌至联赛末席了。

entry.def: Your bottom is the part of your body that you sit on.

example.ex: If there was one thing she could change about her body it would be her bottom.
example.tran: 如果能对自己的身体做一点改变，那她会选择臀部。

entry.tran: （比基尼泳装的）泳裤；（田径服、睡衣的）裤子
entry.def: The lower part of a bikini, tracksuit, or pair of pyjamas can be referred to as the bottoms or the bottom.

example.ex: She wore blue tracksuit bottoms.
example.tran: 她穿了一件蓝色田径裤。

example.ex: ...a skimpy bikini bottom.
example.tran: 极其暴露的比基尼泳裤

entry.def: You use at bottom to emphasize that you are stating what you think is the real nature of something or the real truth about a situation.

example.ex: The two systems are, at bottom, conceptual models...
example.tran: 这两个系统实质上是两种概念模式。

example.ex: At bottom, such an attitude is born not of concern for your welfare, but out of fear of losing you.
example.tran: 实际上，这种态度并非源自对你幸福的关心，而是出于害怕失去你。

entry.tran: 是…的真正原因；是…的根源
entry.def: If something is at the bottom of a problem or unpleasant situation, it is the real cause of it.

example.ex: Often I find that anger and resentment are at the bottom of the problem.
example.tran: 我常常发现愤怒和不满是问题的真正根源。

entry.def: You can say that you mean something from the bottom of your heart to emphasize that you mean it very sincerely.

example.ex: I'm happy, and I mean that from the bottom of my heart...
example.tran: 我很开心，而且是那种发自肺腑的开心。

example.ex: I want to thank everyone from the bottom of my heart.
example.tran: 我要衷心感谢每一个人。

entry.tran: 找到…的真正起因；查寻到…的根源
entry.def: If you want to get to the bottom of a problem, you want to solve it by finding out its real cause.

example.ex: I have to get to the bottom of this mess.
example.tran: 我必须查清造成这一混乱局面的真正原因。

entry.def: Some people say bottoms up to each other just before drinking an alcoholic drink.

means.word_mean: 1. the lower side of anything
2. the lowest part of anything;

sentences.sentence: "they started at the bottom of the hill"

means.word_mean: 3. the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on;

sentences.sentence: "he deserves a good kick in the butt"
"are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?"

means.word_mean: 4. the second half of an inning; while the home team is at bat
5. a depression forming the ground under a body of water;

sentences.sentence: "he searched for treasure on the ocean bed"

means.word_mean: 6. low-lying alluvial land near a river
7. a cargo ship;

sentences.sentence: "they did much of their overseas trade in foreign bottoms"

means.word_mean: 1. provide with a bottom or a seat;
2. strike the ground, as with a ship's bottom
3. come to understand
1. situated at the bottom or lowest position;
2. at the bottom; lowest or last;
3. the lowest rank;

example.zh: 国务院里灯光亮至深夜。

Sentence.sentence: Despite bottoming out in 1933, the Depression didn't end until World War II.
You know I've often wondered why people laugh at the picture of a big belly businessman slipping on a banana skin and falling on his bottom.
It sits firmly on solid rock at the bottom of the ocean.

means.word_mean: 底部, 基部, 下端, 末尾; 水底

sentences.en: The water drained out of the flowerpot through the hole in the bottom.
sentences.cn: 水从花盆底部的洞漏出去。

sentences.en: The skirt should be flared at the bottom.
He is always at the bottom of the class.
sentences.cn: 他的成绩在班上总是排在最末。

means.word_mean: 尽头, 末端

sentences.en: I'll walk with you to the bottom of the road.
sentences.cn: 我和你一起走到路的尽头。

means.word_mean: 臀部, 屁股
使建立在…的基础上，把…基于，使基(于)，以…为基础，为…打下基础；为…提供根据，以…为根据(on或upon)

sentences.en: We wanted to bottom our plan on a solid basis.
sentences.cn: 我们想把我们的计划建立在牢固的基础上。

means.word_mean: 建立基础；被建立在，基于，赖于成立；根据(on或upon)

sentences.en: Our theory bottoms on a solid basis.
sentences.cn: 我们的理论建立在牢固的基础上。

means.word_mean: 达最低点(out)

sentences.en: There is sign that the recession has bottomed out.
sentences.cn: 有迹象表明萧条已达最低点。

means.word_mean: (经济衰退等)不再继续恶化；(价格等在回升前)降到最低点，达到回升前的最低点(out)

sentences.en: The declining securities market yesterday bottomed out and began to rise.
sentences.cn: 一直衰退的证券市场昨天股票价格下跌到最低点后开始回升了。

means.word_mean: (汽车底盘)触地；(汽车弹簧或减震器)被压缩到极限

sentences.en: The car bottomed too easily on the bumpy road.
sentences.cn: 汽车在崎岖不平的道路上行驶，其底盘太容易触地了。

jushi.english: They explored the bottom of the sea.
The bottom of the nest is laid with feathers and hair.
jushi.chinese: 巢的底部是用羽毛和头发铺成的。

jushi.english: He drained the cup of sorrow to the bottom.
